svg:
#mermaid-1769884717283{font-family:"trebuchet ms",verdana,arial,sans-serif;font-size:16px;fill:#000000;}@keyframes edge-animation-frame{from{stroke-dashoffset:0;}}@keyframes dash{to{stroke-dashoffset:0;}}#mermaid-1769884717283 .edge-animation-slow{stroke-dasharray:9,5!important;stroke-dashoffset:900;animation:dash 50s linear infinite;stroke-linecap:round;}#mermaid-1769884717283 .edge-animation-fast{stroke-dasharray:9,5!important;stroke-dashoffset:900;animation:dash 20s linear infinite;stroke-linecap:round;}#mermaid-1769884717283 .error-icon{fill:#552222;}#mermaid-1769884717283 .error-text{fill:#552222;stroke:#552222;}#mermaid-1769884717283 .edge-thickness-normal{stroke-width:1px;}#mermaid-1769884717283 .edge-thickness-thick{stroke-width:3.5px;}#mermaid-1769884717283 .edge-pattern-solid{stroke-dasharray:0;}#mermaid-1769884717283 .edge-thickness-invisible{stroke-width:0;fill:none;}#mermaid-1769884717283 .edge-pattern-dashed{stroke-dasharray:3;}#mermaid-1769884717283 .edge-pattern-dotted{stroke-dasharray:2;}#mermaid-1769884717283 .marker{fill:#666;stroke:#666;}#mermaid-1769884717283 .marker.cross{stroke:#666;}#mermaid-1769884717283 svg{font-family:"trebuchet ms",verdana,arial,sans-serif;font-size:16px;}#mermaid-1769884717283 p{margin:0;}#mermaid-1769884717283 .label{font-family:"trebuchet ms",verdana,arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;}#mermaid-1769884717283 .cluster-label text{fill:#333;}#mermaid-1769884717283 .cluster-label span{color:#333;}#mermaid-1769884717283 .cluster-label span p{background-color:transparent;}#mermaid-1769884717283 .label text,#mermaid-1769884717283 span{fill:#000000;color:#000000;}#mermaid-1769884717283 .node rect,#mermaid-1769884717283 .node circle,#mermaid-1769884717283 .node ellipse,#mermaid-1769884717283 .node polygon,#mermaid-1769884717283 .node path{fill:#eee;stroke:#999;stroke-width:1px;}#mermaid-1769884717283 .rough-node .label text,#mermaid-1769884717283 .node .label text,#mermaid-1769884717283 .image-shape .label,#mermaid-1769884717283 .icon-shape .label{text-anchor:middle;}#mermaid-1769884717283 .node .katex path{fill:#000;stroke:#000;stroke-width:1px;}#mermaid-1769884717283 .rough-node .label,#mermaid-1769884717283 .node .label,#mermaid-1769884717283 .image-shape .label,#mermaid-1769884717283 .icon-shape .label{text-align:center;}#mermaid-1769884717283 .node.clickable{cursor:pointer;}#mermaid-1769884717283 .root .anchor path{fill:#666!important;stroke-width:0;stroke:#666;}#mermaid-1769884717283 .arrowheadPath{fill:#333333;}#mermaid-1769884717283 .edgePath .path{stroke:#666;stroke-width:2.0px;}#mermaid-1769884717283 .flowchart-link{stroke:#666;fill:none;}#mermaid-1769884717283 .edgeLabel{background-color:white;text-align:center;}#mermaid-1769884717283 .edgeLabel p{background-color:white;}#mermaid-1769884717283 .edgeLabel rect{opacity:0.5;background-color:white;fill:white;}#mermaid-1769884717283 .labelBkg{background-color:rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5);}#mermaid-1769884717283 .cluster rect{fill:hsl(0, 0%, 98.9215686275%);stroke:#707070;stroke-width:1px;}#mermaid-1769884717283 .cluster text{fill:#333;}#mermaid-1769884717283 .cluster span{color:#333;}#mermaid-1769884717283 div.mermaidTooltip{position:absolute;text-align:center;max-width:200px;padding:2px;font-family:"trebuchet ms",verdana,arial,sans-serif;font-size:12px;background:hsl(-160, 0%, 93.3333333333%);border:1px solid #707070;border-radius:2px;pointer-events:none;z-index:100;}#mermaid-1769884717283 .flowchartTitleText{text-anchor:middle;font-size:18px;fill:#000000;}#mermaid-1769884717283 rect.text{fill:none;stroke-width:0;}#mermaid-1769884717283 .icon-shape,#mermaid-1769884717283 .image-shape{background-color:white;text-align:center;}#mermaid-1769884717283 .icon-shape p,#mermaid-1769884717283 .image-shape p{background-color:white;padding:2px;}#mermaid-1769884717283 .icon-shape rect,#mermaid-1769884717283 .image-shape rect{opacity:0.5;background-color:white;fill:white;}#mermaid-1769884717283 .label-icon{display:inline-block;height:1em;overflow:visible;vertical-align:-0.125em;}#mermaid-1769884717283 .node .label-icon path{fill:currentColor;stroke:revert;stroke-width:revert;}#mermaid-1769884717283 :root{--mermaid-font-family:"trebuchet ms",verdana,arial,sans-serif;}#mermaid-1769884717283 .disk>*{fill:#e3f2fd!important;stroke:#1976d2!important;stroke-width:2px!important;}#mermaid-1769884717283 .disk span{fill:#e3f2fd!important;stroke:#1976d2!important;stroke-width:2px!important;}#mermaid-1769884717283 .info>*{fill:#fff9c4!important;stroke:#f57f17!important;stroke-width:2px!important;}#mermaid-1769884717283 .info span{fill:#fff9c4!important;stroke:#f57f17!important;stroke-width:2px!important;}#mermaid-1769884717283 .mirror>*{fill:#c8e6c9!important;stroke:#388e3c!important;stroke-width:2px!important;}#mermaid-1769884717283 .mirror span{fill:#c8e6c9!important;stroke:#388e3c!important;stroke-width:2px!important;}#mermaid-1769884717283 .summary>*{fill:#f3e5f5!important;stroke:#7b1fa2!important;stroke-width:3px!important;}#mermaid-1769884717283 .summary span{fill:#f3e5f5!important;stroke:#7b1fa2!important;stroke-width:3px!important;}
RAID 6 - Striping with Double Parity
Disk 1 ---
Block A1
Parity BP
Parity CQ
Disk 2 ---
Block A2
Block B1
Parity CP
Disk 3 ---
Parity AP
Block B2
Block C1
Disk 4 ---
Parity AQ
Parity BQ
Block C2
‚ö° Performance: Moderate
üíæ Capacity: (n-2)/n
üõ°Ô∏è Fault Tolerance: 2 disks
‚úÖ Min 4 disks required
RAID 5 - Striping with Parity
Disk 1 ---
Block A1
Block B2
Parity C
Disk 2 ---
Block A2
Parity B
Block C1
Disk 3 ---
Parity A
Block B1
Block C2
‚ö° Performance: Good
üíæ Capacity: (n-1)/n
üõ°Ô∏è Fault Tolerance: 1 disk
‚úÖ Min 3 disks required
RAID 1 - Mirroring
Disk 1 ---
Block A
Block B
Block C
üîÑ Mirror
Disk 2 ---
Block A
Block B
Block C
‚ö° Performance: Read Fast
üíæ Capacity: 50%
üõ°Ô∏è Fault Tolerance: 1 disk
‚úÖ Complete data redundancy
RAID 0 - Striping (No Redundancy)
Disk 1 ---
Block A1
Block A3
Block A5
Disk 2 ---
Block A2
Block A4
Block A6
‚ö° Performance: Excellent
üíæ Capacity: 100%
üõ°Ô∏è Fault Tolerance: NONE
‚ùå Any disk failure = data loss
üìä RAID Selection Guide ----------------
RAID 0: Maximum performance, no safety
RAID 1: Maximum safety, 50% capacity
RAID 5: Balanced (common for servers)
RAID 6: High safety (critical systems)
